About me

My name is Nick Romano, and I operate out of a quiet home near Knoxville, TN. Software development has always been an obsession of mine, up to and including when I graduated from Maryville College with a Bachelor's in Computer Science.

I work with the great folks at the University of Tennessee College of Law to provide our own web portal with many features that can only be done in a modern web application. The rest of my time belongs to side projects, game streaming, and my beautiful animal friends Zora 😽 and Wilson 🐶.

I'm always learning new skills. I have several years experience in .NET, Javascript, and various web frameworks, including Vue.js. This website is written with Nuxt.js. I have also developed and released Android applications using both Java and Kotlin. Currently I'm working a lot with PWAs and Cloud DevOps solutions.

Contact me by sending an email to dev@njromano.com.
